MapSubscriptionHeartbeatRequestPacket Class Reference

Packet to be sent from a module providing subscription content to a module that is subscribing to the content. More...

Detailed Description

Packet to be sent from a module providing subscription content to a module that is subscribing to the content.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MapSubscriptionHeartbeatRequestPacket::MapSubscriptionHeartbeatRequestPacket (  uint32  serviceID,
const set< uint32 > &  subscribed,
const set< uint32 > &  unsubscribed
) 
 

Constructor.

No request ID and packetID:s are used, since this kind of packets should not be included in requests.

Parameters:
subscribed Set of successfully subscribed maps.
unsubscribed Set of recently removed maps (so if we know that a map has been removed, we do not have to wait for the next one.
